trans-unit.source: Describes the console key that was pressed, including the character represented by the console key and the state of the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 說明按下的主控台按鍵，包括主控台按鍵表示的字元，以及 SHIFT、ALT 和 CTRL 輔助按鍵 (Modifier Key) 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> type is not intended to be created by users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>型別不適合由使用者建立。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，傳回給使用者，以回應呼叫<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object describes the <xref:System.ConsoleKey> constant and Unicode character, if any, that correspond to the pressed console key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件描述<xref:System.ConsoleKey>常數和 Unicode 字元，如果有的話，對應至按的主控台按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object also describes, in a bitwise combination of <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers> values, whether one or more SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier keys was pressed simultaneously with the console key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件也描述中的位元組合<xref:System.ConsoleModifiers>值、 一個或多個 SHIFT、 ALT 或 CTRL 輔助按鍵與主控台按鍵的同時按下。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>讀取作業中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character that corresponds to the <c>key</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 對應於 <c>key</c> 參數的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The console key that corresponds to the <c>keyChar</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 對應於 <c>keyChar</c> 參數的主控台按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that a SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若按下 SHIFT 鍵則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that an ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若按下 ALT 鍵則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that a CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若按下 CTRL 鍵則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> structure using the specified character, console key, and modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字元、主控台按鍵和輔助按鍵來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 結構的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This type is not intended to be created by users.
trans-unit.target: 此類型不是使用者所建立。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is returned to the user in response to calling the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，傳回給使用者，以回應呼叫<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> type does not specify whether the left or right SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL modifier key was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>類型並未指定左或向右 SHIFT、 ALT 或 CTRL 輔助按鍵是否按下。

trans-unit.source: The numeric value of the <paramref name="key" /> parameter is less than 0 or greater than 255.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 參數的數值小於 0 或大於 255。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an object or specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示物件或指定的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件是否和目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件是否相等如果及其對應<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>屬性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A> method performs slightly better than the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method because it does not have to convert `obj` to an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A>方法會稍微執行優於<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法因為並沒有轉換`obj`物件。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指定的物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is a <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object and is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件且等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件是否相等如果及其對應<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>屬性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method is not suitable for distinguishing one <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> object from another.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法不適合用來區別一個<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>從另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: If your application needs a unique hash code, override the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method with your own method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式需要唯一的雜湊程式碼，請覆寫<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法與您自己的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.GetHashCode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the console key represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件表示的主控台按鍵。

trans-unit.source: A value that identifies the console key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 值，辨識按下的主控台按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A> property in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>讀取作業中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Unicode character represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件表示的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: An object that corresponds to the console key represented by the current <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 物件，該物件對應於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件所表示的主控台按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the key pressed does not map to a Unicode character (for example, if the user presses the **F1** key or the **Home** key), the value of the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A> property is \U0000.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下的索引鍵不會對應到 Unicode 字元 (例如，如果使用者按下**F1**索引鍵或**首頁**索引鍵)，值<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>屬性是 \U0000。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A> property to add the characters input by the user into a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>加入字串的字元輸入使用者的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example ignores special keys other than **ENTER**, **ESC**, and **BACKSPACE**.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會忽略特殊鍵以外**ENTER**， **ESC**，和**退格鍵**。

trans-unit.source: Gets a bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> values that specifies one or more modifier keys pressed simultaneously with the console key.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleModifiers" /> 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，指定一或多個輔助按鍵與主控台按鍵同時按下。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 它沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using a <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> property in a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>讀取作業中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 等於 <paramref name="a" />，則為 <paramref name="b" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件是否相等如果及其對應<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>屬性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.ConsoleKeyInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子的對等方法是<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Equals%28System.ConsoleKeyInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> objects are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.ConsoleKeyInfo" /> 物件是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is not equal to <paramref name="b" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 不等於 <paramref name="a" />，則為 <paramref name="b" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo> objects are equal if their corresponding <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>, <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>, and <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo>物件是否相等如果及其對應<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.KeyChar%2A>， <xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Key%2A>，和<xref:System.ConsoleKeyInfo.Modifiers%2A>屬性是否相等。
